betaBar.betaFormText: Let us know what you think!

businessFormationDefaults.startDateErrorText: The business formation date must be today or a future date formatted as MM/DD/YYYY
businessFormationDefaults.businessAddressZipCodeErrorText: Must be a NJ Zip Code between 07001 and 08999
businessFormationDefaults.agentNumberErrorText: Registered Agent ID Number must be 4-7 digits
businessFormationDefaults.agentOfficeAddressZipCodeErrorText: Must be a NJ Zip Code between 07001 and 08999
businessFormationDefaults.submitErrorHeading: Formation failed. Errors found in the following fields:
businessFormationDefaults.missingFieldsOnSubmitModalText: Cannot submit. The following fields are missing or invalid:
businessFormationDefaults.successPageSubheader: You have successfully formed your business entity and reserved your business name!
businessFormationDefaults.successPageBody: Below are your requested documents, you can download them for your records until ${expirationDate}.
businessFormationDefaults.membersSuccessTextBody: A member has been added successfully
businessFormationDefaults.addressZipCodeErrorText: Must be a valid 5 digit Zip Code

dashboardDefaults.calendarLegalText: This calendar is not a complete list of your obligations as a business.
dashboardDefaults.calendarTooltip: This calendar shows you NJ filing due dates unique to your business. Click on any item to learn where to file.
dashboardDefaults.backToRoadmapHeader: Want to make sure you properly registered and formed your business?
dashboardDefaults.backToRoadmapText: Our business roadmap will give you a personalized ${link}.

landingPage.heroSupportingText: Get your free, personalized checklist to start your new business in New Jersey.
landingPage.section2SupportingText: Learn what forms and licenses you need to start your business and avoid fines. We’ll ask you a few onboarding questions; be prepared to tell us your:
landingPage.column1SupportingText: Visit our website with more resources to start, operate, and grow your business.
landingPage.column2SupportingText: Already a registered business and want to know the lastest grants and regulations likely to affect your business? Join our weekly newsletter.
landingPage.column2ImageAlt: Sign up for our newsletter icon
landingPage.column3Header: Chat with a New Jersey Representative
landingPage.column3SupportingText: Local experts are available 9 a.m–5 p.m Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, to help you with any business challenge.
landingPage.column3ImageAlt: Chat with a New Jersey representative icon

legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextOne: This information is supplied as a guide and is not a substitute for legal or professional advice. It is the responsibility of the business owner to comply with all local, county, and state regulations even if they are not listed here. For no-cost assistance with your business, use the
legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextTwo: to speak with a Business Advocate based in New Jersey.

licenseSearchTask.primaryCTASecondLineText: with the Division of Consumer Affairs
licenseSearchTask.checkStatusText: After you’ve applied for your license, input the information from your application below to get automatic updates about your application here in your roadmap.
licenseSearchTask.errorTextNotFound: We cannot find your application. Please check the information you’ve entered.
licenseSearchTask.errorTextFieldsRequired: Please fill in all non-optional fields
licenseSearchTask.errorTextSearchFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.
licenseSearchTask.foundText: Great, we’ve found your application! Please check the details below.
licenseSearchTask.tooltipText: Your license status will update automatically after the Division of Consumer Affairs has received your application and you enter your identifying information into the “Check Status” tab below.

onboardingDefaults.errorTextRequiredExistingBusiness: Please select whether you have an existing business.
onboardingDefaults.dateOfFormationErrorText: Your formation date must be in the past, and should be formatted as MM/YYYY.

profileDefaults.errorTextBody: These are errors with some entries, please try again.
profileDefaults.escapeModalHeader: Are you sure you want to continue?
profileDefaults.escapeModalBody: You have unsaved changes that will be lost.

roadmapDefaults.congratulatorModalHeader: You reached a crucial milestone as a business.
roadmapDefaults.graduationHeader: I have formed and registered my business, what’s next?
roadmapDefaults.graduationBodyText: Learn about annual filings, certifications, funding opportunities, and more.

searchBusinessNameTask.unavailableText: Sorry, "${name}" isn’t available. Try another name.
searchBusinessNameTask.similarUnavailableNamesText: Here are similar business names that are already taken:
searchBusinessNameTask.availableText: It looks like "${name}" might be available, but you should next do an official name check using the button below.
searchBusinessNameTask.updateButtonText: Update the name on your Roadmap with this one
searchBusinessNameTask.nameHasBeenUpdatedText: Your business name has been updated
searchBusinessNameTask.officialCheckText: Do an official check with the New Jersey Division of Revenue and Enterprise Services to confirm your name is legally clear to use. Once confirmed, you can reserve the name and form your business.
searchBusinessNameTask.errorTextBadInput: Sorry, that isn't a valid company name. Try being more specific.
searchBusinessNameTask.errorTextSearchFailed: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.

selfRegistration.signupDescriptionText: You'll register for the Business.NJ.gov Navigator with myNewJersey, a secure login platform run by the State of New Jersey. You may have a myNewJersey account already, or you can create one now. Either way, provide your name and email to get started.
selfRegistration.errorTextDuplicateSignup: This email is already registered, please login instead
selfRegistration.errorTextGeneric: Something went wrong, please try again later.
selfRegistration.newsletterCheckboxLabel: I want to receive the Business.NJ.gov newsletter and receive information likely to affect my business.
selfRegistration.userTestingCheckboxLabel: I am willing to be contacted to provide feedback on Business.NJ.gov.

sitewideErrorMessages.errorTextNoData: Something went wrong and we can't access your data. Please try again later.
sitewideErrorMessages.errorTextCachedOnly: We're having trouble connecting; the data you're viewing is cached and it may be out-of-date.
sitewideErrorMessages.errorTextUpdateFailed: Something went wrong with your request. Please try again later.

taskDefaults.taskProgressSuccessToastBody: Your task status has been updated.
taskDefaults.unlockedBySingular: Before starting this task, we recommend that you take a look at:
taskDefaults.unlockedByPlural: Before starting this task, we recommend you take a look at:
